Hydras::

Hydras smirked and said "sounds fair, but I'll manage my bots and 
you, yours and I have aprecious hostage to use gainst maximals with 
our convined power"



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> Tyrael: I thought so. After all, you are a part of Megatron. In 
that 
> case, I suggest a truce. We both want the death of the Maximals and 
> if we manage to meld our mutual strengths, we could deal a deadly 
> blow. However, the matter of your arrest will only be delayed to a 
> more proper time.
>
